properties.title: Luxury 3-Bedroom House in Hyderabad
properties.description: A spacious 3-bedroom house with private gardens and premium finishes. Located in Jubilee Hills, offering exclusivity and tranquility.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Jubilee Hills is an upscale neighborhood with excellent schools, hospitals, and recreational options. It’s popular for its peaceful environment and proximity to IT hubs.

properties.title: Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment in Mumbai
properties.description: A sleek 2-bedroom apartment with modern interiors and excellent amenities. Situated in Bandra, known for its vibrant lifestyle and excellent connectivity.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Bandra is a thriving neighborhood in Mumbai, known for its cafes, boutiques, and nightlife. It offers excellent connectivity to key business districts and beaches.

properties.title: Cozy 1-Bedroom Apartment in Chennai
properties.description: A fully furnished 1-bedroom apartment perfect for professionals. Located in Anna Nagar with access to top restaurants and public transport.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Anna Nagar is a family-friendly area with parks, schools, and shopping complexes. It’s well-connected to the rest of Chennai via metro and buses.

properties.title: Elegant 2-Bedroom Apartment in Kolkata
properties.description: A stylish 2-bedroom apartment with modern interiors and panoramic views. Situated in Salt Lake, close to tech hubs and recreational areas.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Salt Lake City is a prime residential and commercial hub in Kolkata, offering a perfect mix of tranquility and modern amenities. It’s close to top tech companies and cultural landmarks.

properties.title: Premium Office Space in Pune
properties.description: A modern office space located in Koregaon Park, perfect for startups and established businesses. Comes with state-of-the-art facilities.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Koregaon Park is Pune’s most sought-after commercial district, known for its luxurious lifestyle, cafes, and IT hubs. It offers easy access to highways and airports.

properties.title: Spacious 3-Bedroom Apartment in Delhi
properties.description: A beautifully designed 3-bedroom apartment in South Delhi, perfect for families. Close to parks, schools, and metro connectivity.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Hauz Khas is a trendy and upscale area in Delhi, known for its lush greenery, vibrant nightlife, and historical significance.

properties.title: Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment in Ahmedabad
properties.description: A stylish 2-bedroom apartment with contemporary design and excellent amenities. Located in Satellite, one of Ahmedabad's most desirable areas.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Satellite is a thriving neighborhood in Ahmedabad with excellent schools, parks, and shopping complexes. It offers great connectivity to major areas of the city.

properties.title: Elegant 3-Bedroom Apartment in Kochi
properties.description: A spacious 3-bedroom apartment with waterfront views and modern interiors. Located in Marine Drive, one of Kochi's prime localities.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Marine Drive is known for its stunning views of the backwaters, luxury shopping malls, and vibrant cafes. It’s a highly sought-after area in Kochi.

properties.title: Charming 4-Bedroom House in Jaipur
properties.description: A traditional 4-bedroom house with modern amenities, located in a peaceful neighborhood. Perfect for families looking for space and comfort.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Located in the cultural heart of Jaipur, the neighborhood offers proximity to heritage sites, local markets, and excellent schools.

properties.title: Luxury Office Space in Bengaluru
properties.description: A premium office space in Whitefield, equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, ideal for IT and corporate firms.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Whitefield is Bengaluru’s premier IT hub, offering excellent infrastructure, top business parks, and seamless connectivity to the airport.
